this_title: WWI: The First Modern War Season 1
trans_title: 一战：第一次现代战争 第一季
introduction: WW1: THE FIRST MODERN WARThis is the epic story of how The First World War changed the face of battle forever.This War was a war of "firsts", a transitional war from old style hand-to-hand combat with small guns and fixed bayonets and cavalry charges to high tech weaponry that are still features of present-day armed conflicts.
